pwa.install_description: Install the app on your device for quick access and offline use

common.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

form.edit_project_desc: Modify project data and recalculate metrics
form.discard_changes_confirm: Are you sure you want to discard changes?
form.draft_found_message: A saved draft was found. Do you want to load it?

step1.subtitle: Step 1 of 6
step1.question: What's your project name?
step1.helper: Give your business or project a descriptive name
step1.help: Tip: Use a name that clearly describes your business

step2.subtitle: Step 2 of 6
step2.question: How much money do you need to invest?
step2.help: Tip: Add up everything you need to buy before opening

step3.subtitle: Step 3 of 6
step3.question: How much do you expect to sell per month?
step3.helper: A realistic estimate of your monthly sales
step3.help: Tip: Research similar businesses in your area to estimate

step4.subtitle: Step 4 of 6
step4.question: How much do you spend per month?
step4.help: Tip: Don't forget to include both fixed and variable expenses

step5.subtitle: Step 5 of 6
step5.question: For how long should we analyze the project?
step5.help: Tip: 24 months (2 years) is a common period for SMEs

step6.subtitle: Step 6 of 6
step6.question: Do you expect to grow over time?
step6.help: Tip: 5% monthly is realistic for new businesses

roi.label: Profitability
roi.description: How much you earn for every dollar invested

npv.label: Project Value
npv.description: Total profit considering the time value of money

irr.label: Annual Return
irr.description: Annualized rate of return on your investment

payback.label: Payback
payback.description: When you recover your initial investment

compare.title: Scenario Comparison
compare.info_text: Adjust the sliders to see how changes in sales, costs, and discount rate affect the project's financial metrics. Positive values indicate improvements, negative values indicate deterioration.

charts.cumulative_description: Cumulative sum of cash flow over time

validations.invalid_revenue: Yearly revenue must be a positive number

break_even.title: Break-Even Analysis
break_even.chart_description: This chart shows when cumulative revenue exceeds total costs (initial investment + operating costs). The intersection point indicates when the project begins generating net profits.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.no_projects_description: Create your first project to see statistics and comparisons

templates.manufacturing_description: Industrial production with high CAPEX and operating costs
templates.mobile_app_description: App monetized through ads and in-app purchases
templates.restaurant_description: Food service with inventory and labor costs
templates.consulting_description: Professional services with low initial investment

share.link_copied_message: The link has been copied to clipboard
share.copied_message: The message has been copied to clipboard
share.read_only_description: This is a shared project. You cannot edit it, but you can duplicate it to your projects.

share.not_found_message: The shared project does not exist or the link is incorrect

sensitivity.title: Sensitivity Analysis
sensitivity.description: Sensitivity analysis shows how changes in key variables affect the project's financial metrics. It identifies the most critical factors for success.
sensitivity.tornado_description: Impact of ±30% variations in each variable on NPV
sensitivity.variation_note: Bars show the change in NPV with ±30% variations

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.enable_reminders_desc: Receive notifications to review your projects periodically
notifications.reminder_frequency_desc: You will receive a notification to review this project
notifications.permission_denied_message: Please enable notifications in your device settings to use this feature

onboarding.welcome_title: Welcome to Business Case Analyzer Pro!
onboarding.welcome_description: Your professional tool for evaluating the financial viability of business projects. We'll guide you through the key features.
onboarding.create_description: Enter your project's financial data: initial investment, projected revenue, operating costs, and duration. The app will automatically calculate ROI, NPV, IRR, and payback period.
onboarding.compare_description: Adjust critical variables with interactive sliders to simulate different scenarios (optimistic, expected, pessimistic). Visualize the impact in real-time with comparative charts.
onboarding.snapshots_description: Capture and store multiple versions of your analysis. Compare saved scenarios side by side and restore any version as the base for new iterations.
onboarding.export_description: Generate PDF reports with charts, financial metrics, and AI analysis. Share your analyses with stakeholders professionally.

snapshots.title: Scenario History
snapshots.save_description: Enter a name for this scenario
snapshots.no_snapshots_description: Save scenarios from the comparison screen to see them here
snapshots.restore_description: Do you want to restore this scenario as base?
snapshots.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario?
snapshots.comparison_info: This comparison shows the differences between two saved scenarios. Positive values in Scenario B indicate improvements over Scenario A, while negative values indicate deterioration.

mentor.welcome: Hi! I'm your financial mentor. I'll help you understand your numbers and make better business decisions.
mentor.break_even_intro: Let's calculate your break-even point. This is the minimum you need to sell to cover all your costs.
mentor.break_even_success: Great! Your break-even point is {{amount}}. This means you need to sell at least this much to avoid losing money.
mentor.cash_flow_intro: Now let's project your cash flow. This shows you when money comes in and goes out of your business.
mentor.cash_flow_warning: I notice you might run low on cash in month {{month}}. Let's plan ahead to avoid problems.
mentor.loan_intro: Thinking about a loan? Let me help you compare your options and find the best terms.
mentor.loan_advice: Based on the numbers, option {{option}} gives you the best value with lower total interest.
mentor.pricing_intro: Let's find the right price for your product. We need to balance profit margin and sales volume.
mentor.pricing_suggestion: I recommend pricing at {{price}}. This gives you a healthy {{margin}}% margin while staying competitive.
mentor.employee_roi_intro: Considering hiring? Let's calculate if the new employee will generate enough value.
mentor.employee_roi_positive: Good news! This hire should pay for itself in {{months}} months based on expected productivity.
mentor.employee_roi_negative: The numbers show this hire might not be profitable yet. Consider waiting or adjusting the role.
mentor.marketing_intro: Let's analyze your marketing channels to see which ones give the best return on investment.
mentor.marketing_winner: {{channel}} is your best performer with {{roi}}% ROI. Consider investing more here.
mentor.general_tip: Remember: knowing your numbers is the first step to business success. Keep tracking and adjusting!
mentor.encouragement: You're doing great! Every analysis brings you closer to financial clarity.
mentor.next_step: What would you like to explore next?

validations.invalid_investment: Initial investment must be a positive number
validations.invalid_revenue: Yearly revenue must be a positive number
validations.invalid_costs: Invalid costs. Must be a positive number.
validations.invalid_duration: Invalid duration. Must be a positive number.
validations.invalid_growth: Invalid growth. Must be a valid number.
